Interface PersonMapper

All Known Implementing Classes:
PersonMapperImpl
public interface PersonMapper

Person gRPC Mapper

MapStruct mapper for transforming person domain models to gRPC response messages. Converts an internal simple profile model to protobuf message format for gRPC responses.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Jakub Pavlíček
